name: Pictioner
description: Pictioner is a fun guessing game where users need to guess what GPT draws on the canvas within three tries. Users proceed to next rounds as they keep guessing things right or are eliminated when they get a guess wrong. Be ready for endless fun! Pictioner was featured on Product Hunt in May 2023.

name: Hello Cody: A Voice Assistant for VS Code
description: Built as part of Microsoft's internal 'Global Hackathon' where the project won the first place in the developer productivity challenge, this project is now part of GitHub Copilot X. My contributions included initiating the project, pitching to Microsoft and GitHub execs to get buy-in and then collaborating with the GitHub Next team to make it a reality. The project also led to multiple patent filings.

name: Course: Alexa 101, Designing Voice Apps for Alexa
description: An interactive course that teaches learners how to build voice apps for Alexa using practical examples and projects. Made in collaboration with Educative.

name: Sensor Streamer
description: An Android app that allows the user to stream phone sensor info, images and audio in realtime to a provided server running on their Raspberry Pi/computer.

name: Phone Pi Sensor Streamer
description: An Android app that allows the user to stream phone sensor info in realtime to a provided server running on their Raspberry Pi/computer.

name: Resolution Tracker
description: An Amazon Alexa Skill that helps keep track of your new year resolutions and helps tweet your progress to your followers. Resolution Tracker was awarded 'Skill of the month' in December 2017 by Amazon.

name: Trivia Quest
description: An Amazon Alexa game to test your wits and climb on top of a global leaderboard! Trivia Quest has been played by thousands of Alexa users from around the world and has been rated 3.2/5 on Amazon.

name: Multi-step Wizard Fluent
description: A fully customizable React component to build your own multi-step forms.

name: Voice Clues
description: A cross platform voice game available on Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa built using Jovo.

name: SMS Genie
description: An SMS bot to aid in education in remote areas where internet penetration is poor.
